articles.title: A tunable liquid microlaser based on liquid droplets that can be inkjet-printed - Nanowerk
articles.description: Researchers develop a tunable laser based on liquid droplets that can be inkjet-printed, and have a color that changes based on the shape, which may lead to cheaper and more flexible optical communication devices.
articles.content:
